text: Eva Margareta "Meta" Velander (13 August 1924 â€“ 16 May 2025) was a Swedish actress. She was born in Danderyd, Sweden. Velander was raised in Stockholm. Her career began in 1945 and she retired in 2020. Velander is known for voice dubbing several voice roles in Disney movies. Her works include: The Aristocats (1970), The Rescuers (1977), The Black Cauldron (1985), The Great Mouse Detective (1986), Beauty and the Beast (1991), and in The Incredibles (2004). Velander turned 100 in August 2024. Velander died on 16 May 2025 in Djursholm, Sweden at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Swedish centenarians Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Meta Velander
